forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 71, with temperatures rising to around 73 overnight. Southwest wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Cloudy

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
